I do want to say that the medication was very effective at lowering my blood pressure. My blood pressure ran 180 over 100 and it has been really hard for me to find an effective medication. I am a 70 year old male in the UK, and have taken 5mg Amlodipine daily for about 18 months. It has reduced my BP which was around 160/90 to around 110/70 now.  Initially I did not notice any side effects, but in the last few months there has been a whole catalogue of them.
